Uses of Class
net.sf.JRecord.Details.LayoutDetail

  • Packages that use LayoutDetail 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord
    This package holds JRecordInterface1 class, the new main interface for JRecord
    net.sf.JRecord.def.IO.builders
    This package holds the IOBuilder definitions.
    net.sf.JRecord.Details
    This package holds Classes that describe a Files Structure RecordLayout + the lines (Line, XmlLine) in the File.
    net.sf.JRecord.External
    This package holds classes that convert Record-Layouts (copybooks) between external Files and the internal representation.
    net.sf.JRecord.IO
    This package holds all Record-Oriented IO routines.
    net.sf.JRecord.schema  
    net.sf.JRecord.utilityClasses  
    net.sf.JRecord.zExamples.cobol.toCsv

      void AbstractLine.setLayout(LayoutDetail pLayout)
      Deprecated. 
      This was used in the RecordEditor where it's use could be controlled. Only use it in JRecord if you know what you are doing. Basically it works if the Layouts are very similar.
